${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:RubertEmpireMechanicalCogwheel.NAME: Rubert Empire Mechanical Cogwheel
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a room, gain #b%d #yGold. Whenever you have more than #b%d #yGold, loss all gold

${modID}:PaymentBonusRelic.NAME: Payment Bonus
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain this relic, add a Curse Of Poverty to your deck. In every battle, the first card of some cost (0,1,2,...,X) will play twice.
And what, must we give it return ?
